actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to designate the building known as the Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Greenville, South Carolina, as the "Clement F. Haynesworth, Jr., Federal Building."

summary.text: Designates the Federal Building and U.S. Courthouse in Greenville, South Carolina, as the Clement F. Haynsworth, Jr., Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the building known as the Federal Building and United States Courthouse in Greenville, South Carolina, as the "Clement F. Haynesworth, Jr., Federal Building."
